requirements.description: Job picker modal should be wider so melee DPS jobs fit in one row
stepsToVerify: Click 'Add Job' button to open job picker modal
Locate the 'Melee DPS' category section
Verify all 6 melee DPS jobs (MNK, DRG, NIN, SAM, RPR, VPR) display in a single row
Verify no job wraps to a second row within the melee category

requirements.description: When adding a job, user can choose between preset BiS or manual slot-by-slot configuration
stepsToVerify: Click 'Add Job' and select a job
Verify a second step appears with two options: 'Use Preset BiS' and manual configuration
Verify 'Use Preset BiS' button applies the hardcoded preset for that job
Verify manual configuration shows all 11 slots with raid/tome toggle for each
Verify selecting manual options correctly sets the slot types

requirements.description: User can change any slot's type (raid/tome) on the job gear page at any time
stepsToVerify: Select a character and job with gear table visible
Click on a slot's type badge (Raid or Tome) in the Type column
Verify the type toggles between Raid and Tome
Verify the checkbox UI updates appropriately (Have for raid, Base/Upgraded for tome)
Verify the slot's checkbox state resets to unchecked when type changes
Verify the change persists after page refresh

requirements.description: Character rename uses custom HTML modal instead of browser prompt()
stepsToVerify: Click 'Rename' button on a character
Verify a styled HTML modal appears (not browser prompt)
Verify modal has input field pre-filled with current name
Verify modal has Cancel and Confirm buttons
Verify clicking Cancel closes modal without changes
Verify clicking Confirm with new name updates character name

requirements.description: Character delete uses custom HTML confirm modal instead of browser confirm()
stepsToVerify: Click 'Delete' button on a character
Verify a styled HTML confirmation modal appears (not browser confirm)
Verify modal displays character name being deleted
Verify modal has Cancel and Delete buttons
Verify clicking Cancel closes modal without deleting
Verify clicking Delete removes the character

requirements.description: Job remove uses custom HTML confirm modal instead of browser confirm()
stepsToVerify: Click the X button on a job pill to remove it
Verify a styled HTML confirmation modal appears (not browser confirm)
Verify modal displays job name being removed
Verify modal has Cancel and Remove buttons
Verify clicking Cancel closes modal without removing job
Verify clicking Remove deletes the job from character

requirements.description: Add character uses custom HTML modal instead of browser prompt()
stepsToVerify: Click 'Add' button in character list header
Verify a styled HTML modal appears (not browser prompt)
Verify modal has input field for character name
Verify modal has Cancel and Create buttons
Verify clicking Cancel closes modal without creating
Verify clicking Create with valid name adds new character

requirements.description: Raid gear slots display which turn (boss) the piece drops from
stepsToVerify: Select a job with raid BiS items
Verify weapon slot shows '4th Turn' label
Verify head, hands, feet slots show '2nd Turn' label
Verify body, legs slots show '3rd Turn' label
Verify earrings, necklace, bracelets, ring slots show '1st Turn' label
Verify turn labels appear in or near the Type column for raid items

requirements.description: Tome gear slots display the tomestone cost for that piece
stepsToVerify: Select a job with tome BiS items
Verify weapon slot shows '500' tomestones
Verify head, hands, feet slots show '495' tomestones each
Verify body, legs slots show '825' tomestones each
Verify earrings, necklace, bracelets, ring slots show '375' tomestones each
Verify costs appear in or near the Type column for tome items

requirements.description: Right side panel shows summary of remaining raid drops needed by turn
stepsToVerify: Select a job with unchecked raid gear slots
Verify a summary panel appears to the right of the gear table
Verify panel groups unchecked raid pieces by turn (1st Turn, 2nd Turn, etc.)
Verify each turn shows count of drops needed (e.g., '1st Turn: 3 drops')
Verify turns with no remaining drops are hidden or show 0
Verify summary updates in real-time when checkboxes change

requirements.description: Right side panel shows total tomestones needed for remaining tome pieces
stepsToVerify: Select a job with unchecked tome gear slots
Verify summary panel shows total tomestone cost for all incomplete tome pieces
Verify only non-upgraded tome slots are counted (base-only counts as incomplete)
Verify format shows 'Tomestones: X' with comma-formatted number
Verify total updates in real-time when checkboxes change
Verify total shows 0 when all tome slots are upgraded

requirements.description: Summary panel layout and styling matches app theme
stepsToVerify: View summary panel on job page
Verify panel uses dark theme consistent with rest of app
Verify raid drops and tome costs are visually distinct sections
Verify panel is positioned to the right of gear table on desktop
Verify panel adapts appropriately on mobile (below table or collapsible)
